comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview result of a data set binding to report date type parameter.

Build number:
2.3.0.v20071207-0800
Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report parameter NewParameter type as Date and default value as 
   "2003-01-10".
2. New a data set dset:
select * from CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS where CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS.ORDERDATE=?
   bind param_1 to NewParameter.
3. Preview result.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Cannot convert the parameter value params["NewParameter1"] to type class java.sql.Date.
Can not convert the value of params["NewParameter1"] to java.sql.Date type.

Caused by: org.eclipse.birt.core.exception.CoreException: Can not convert the value of params["NewParameter1"] to java.sql.Date type.

The JS expression for the default value "2003-01-10" is error. The correct one is "\"2003-01-10\"". Fix the bug.

traces.message: Cannot convert the parameter value params["NewParameter1"] to type class java.sql.Date. Can not convert the value of params["NewParameter1"] to java.sql.Date type.
